parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: ForceFlush
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcefully refresh the data that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false**: no

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The path to the scheduled task.
